name: Full length latex Gym trainer
description:
Colors: Azul Blue
Sizes: XS-30, S-32, M-34, L-36, XL-38, 2X-40, 3X-42
Description: #1 seller! Perfect for getting that hour glass look! Are you ready to maximize your workout with a faja style waist cinching garment? The Workout Band is an waist cincher that you wear anytime you’re going to be active. Take it to the gym or for a run outside and let it add impact to your healthy lifestyle routine. Here’s how it works. You wrap the band around your midsection. This action creates compression in your core, stimulating thermal activity and ramping up perspiration. This process allows toxins and impurities to exit the skin, while mobilizing fat cells. Put simply, the band helps ensure that your workout is working for you.  The band itself is constructed from a latex core with a soft cotton exterior and interior lining. It sits at your waist, extending to the upper abdominals. Two columns of hook-and-eye closures allow you to size the garment down with you. FelixBoning anchors the cincher and prevents migration. If you’ve been thinking about adding a supplement to your active lifestyle, you’ll love the power the Workout Band brings with it!
RESULTS
Midsection control
Increased thermal activity
Loss of inches reported
Mobilizes fat cells
Stimulates perspiration
FEATURES
Latex workout band
Hook-and-eye closures
FlexiBoning
Cotton lining

name: The Perfect lift
description:
Colors: Nude, Black 
Sizes: 28,30,32,34,36 (P,S,M,L,(XL Nude Only)
Description: This Perfect Butt Lifter is one of our best sellers! Does your heavyweight shaperthe ball when it’s time to lift your rear? If you’ve been looking for a shaper that for you’re going to love the easy wear and rear rounding of the Perfect Butt . Unlike other heavier shapers, the hosiery weight of this shaper’s stretch fabric is a great balance of control and comfort, slimming without adding a lot of weight or increase in body temperature. A special weave in the legs of the garment provides additional thigh control and holds the garment in place. But inside this lightweight fabric, the Perfect Butt Thermal Pant’s natural latex tummy panel provides extra slimming and activates thermal activity in your core. This thermal activity supports slimming by increasing perspiration in the area, mobilizing fat and toxins, which maximizes the work your muscles already do. But that’s just the beginning! The open bottom design of this item creates a lifting effect that rounds the rear into a perfect shape. Now you don’t have to settle for a slimming short that comes up short when it’s time to enhance your bottom. Light, lovely and always in control, from your belly to your booty you’re going to love the way you look in the Perfect Butt.
 
RESULTS

Comfortable control

FEATURES
